column4: When I try to install Ubuntu 64 bit Desktop, I get the the first menu okay, but using any of the options just brings up a screen with lines.  I tried it on two different PC's.  Can anyone help me out?
Did you do a checksum of the CD after burning it and compare with the web-site checksums to ensure the image isn't corrupted?
I didn't but I burned the image twice.  Attempting to use the check media button in the installer also brings up the same lines.
That sounds like pretty good evidence of corruption to me
